name: Fiery Rebirth
description: When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 Pyro DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 $[K103].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character <color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>, and heal them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
